title: 25.1 (LOA)
content:
Since Silaro activated the Ziggurats, the humming sound is both louder and lower, resonating at a level that is almost beyond hearing. You can feel it profoundly in your chest, however, down into your bones.

You feel the hairs on your body stand on end. Touching anything metallic results in a powerful shock, and the very air seems filled with electricity.

Each Ranger either discards 1 FIT energy or suffers 2 fatigue.
